K12n259u_001:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ || [1]
K12n259u_001:3: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
K12n259u_001:4: asti mañjuśrīrupariṣṭāyāmaparimitaguṇasaṃcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyu[r]jñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati | [2]
K12n259u_001:8: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātramapi śroṣyanti yāvat pustakāgatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-cīvara-cchatra-dhvaja-ghaṇṭā-patākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣināyuṣaḥ punareva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti |
K12n259u_001:9: ye khalu punarmañjuśriḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācaviṣyanti,
K12n259u_001:11: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣāmapyāyurvivardhayiṣyati | [3]
K12n259u_001:12: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrirdīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti teṣāṃ ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti | [4]
K12n259u_001:13: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya,
K12n259u_001:16: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā | [5]
K12n259u_001:17: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecillikhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
K12n259u_001:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam | [7]
K12n259u_001:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitam | [8]
K12n259u_001:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭinām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [9]
K12n259u_001:28: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣītam | [10]
K12n259u_001:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [11]
K12n259u_001:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [12]
K12n259u_001:34: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣattriṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [13]
K12n259u_001:36: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [14]
K12n259u_001:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ | [15]
K12n259u_001:40: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati |
K12n259u_001:43: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācin narakeṣupapadyate na tiryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācidapi upapatsyate
K12n259u_001:45: tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati | [17]
K12n259u_001:47: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti | [18]
K12n259u_001:49: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti | [19]
K12n259u_001:51: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti | [20]
K12n259u_001:52: [Para. 21 is missing in the Sanskrit text.]
K12n259u_001:55: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣā na rākṣasā nākālmṛtyuravataraṃ lapsyante | [22]
K12n259u_001:57: as para. 5] yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
K12n259u_001:58: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
K12n259u_001:61: nātm kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā | [23]
K12n259u_001:64: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā rakṣāvaraṇāguptiṃ kariṣyanti | [24]
K12n259u_001:66: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātav amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate | [25]
K12n259u_001:70: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ karṇāpuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃbodhimabhisambhotsyante | [26]
K12n259u_001:72: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācidapi bhaviṣyati | [27]
K12n259u_001:74: yaidamaparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpanāṃ dānaṃdāsyati,
K12n259u_001:75: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati | [28]
K12n259u_001:80: yathā vipaśvi-śikhi-viśvabhu-krakucchanda-kanakamuni-kāśyapa-śākyamuni-prabhṛtīnaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskadhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
K12n259u_001:81: na tvaparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum | [30]
K12n259u_001:83: yathā sūmeroḥ parvatarājasya samānaṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
K12n259u_001:91: yaidamaparimitāyuḥsūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti | [33]
K12n259u_001:94: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam || [34]
K12n259u_001:96: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśantam ||[35]
K12n259u_001:98: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[36]
K12n259u_001:100: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[37]
K12n259u_001:102: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[38]
K12n259u_001:104: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[39]
K12n259u_001:106: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandamiti | [40]
